ISSUE.TITLE: bug: example about how to enable Stream proxy is wrong
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Issue description example from [here](https://github.com/apache/apisix/blob/master/doc/stream-proxy.md) is wrong ``` apisix: stream_proxy: # TCP/UDP proxy tcp: # TCP proxy address list - 9100 - 127.0.0.1:9101 udp: # UDP proxy address list - 9200 - 127.0.0.1:9211 ``` should be ``` apisix: stream_proxy: # TCP/UDP proxy tcp: # TCP proxy port list - 9100 - 9101 udp: # UDP proxy port list - 9200 - 9211 ``` otherwise ``` nginx: [error] init_by_lua error: .../apisix//deps/share/lua/5.1/tinyyaml.lua:641: failed to classify line: 127.0.0.1:9101 stack traceback: [C]: in function 'error' .../apisix//deps/share/lua/5.1/tinyyaml.lua:641: in function 'parsemap' ``` ### Environment * apisix version (cmd: `apisix version`): master * OS:

COMMIT.MESSAGE: docs: fix stream proxy example (#2819) fix #2808
